Posts.Content: Can one get very sore lymph nodes under the arm from shaving and razor burn??? I've been having alot of underarm tenderness and breast tenderness since I used a new shaver. ( Schick Intuition) If not. Why am I having so much pain and tenderness in my axillary area?? I don't even know if its my lymph nodes or my axillary breast tissue. Can anyone help thanks
Posts.Title: Underarm Tenderness

Posts.Content: Quote: Originally Posted by Susannah Yes, definitely. When I saw a breast surgeon because I had some lumps in my breast, and swollen lymph nodes, she told me the most common cause of swollen lymph nodes in the armpit area is shaving (turns out for me, the lumps were the onset of fibrocystic breasts, and the lymph nodes were that I had mono but didn't know it yet). So, I would think most definitely it could cause it. Why don't you change back to your old razor and see if it goes away? Thanks so much for your reply Susannah
Posts.Title: Underarm Tenderness
